about_the_game:
"Dreaming of the perfect university life?"
"Ready to shape your own unique ending?"

Wanna Sleep All Day, But... is a university life simulation and interactive cultivation game that lets you explore the vibrant and dynamic world of Chinese university life.Make meaningful choices, grow through challenges, and carve out your own unique path.

Your story, your ending—it's all up to you!

  • Choose from four main storylines: taking Postgraduate Entrance Exam, securing a postgraduate recommendation, taking civil service exams, or entering the workforce. Each path comes with its own unique challenges and story developments.

  • Beyond the main routes, explore a variety of engaging side quests: study abroad, deliver food, master martial arts, and much more.

  • Dive into a variety of activities like studying, working part-time, shopping, and running errands. Engage in mini-games to develop your skills and enhance your attributes.

  • Explore diverse random events and unique storylines woven into everyday life—there's always something new waiting for you to experience!

Along your university journey, you’ll encounter a diverse cast of characters, including:

  • A gentle and introverted roommate,

  • A dazzling and accomplished senior,

  • A cheerful and outgoing high school friend,

  • A creative and cultured peer.

Build relationships through daily interactions on campus, evolving from acquaintances to close companions. As your bonds deepen, each character’s unique storyline will unfold.
Beyond their personal arcs, these characters play key roles in both main and side storylines, growing alongside you as you shape your university experience.

Will you compete or take it easy? Pursue graduate studies or dive into the workforce?
Will you become a successful achiever in academics, career, and love, or embark on a journey of self-discovery to carve out your own unique path?
The choice is yours.
